snippet.title: Q: color grid cells in the United States and Canada
snippet.description: I would like to color grid cells in the United States and Canada. My goal is very similar to this question: R Plot Filled Longitude-Latitude Grid Cells on Map However, that question only deals … with the United States and I cannot figure out how to add Canada. I was able to draw a map of the U.S. and Canada by modifying code found here: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/ggplot2/KAKhoE0GO4U …

snippet.title: Q: How to draw D3 Map with United States, Canada, Mexico and Puerto Rico

I need a map with Canada (by province), Mexico (by state) and Puerto Rico on it as well. Any recommendation for the best projection on this map would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!-Dre …

I'm planning to do something fancier than just shading the state's shape …

snippet.title: A: How can I get a list of instantiated beans from Spring?
snippet.description: . That way, you can easily reset state of your singletons / mocks without having to destroy / refresh the context. Example: You have a mock DAO: public void MockDao implements IDao { private Map … ); } @After public void reset() { database.clear(); } } The annotation will make sure reset() will be called after each unit test to clean up the internal state. …

I don't want … anything fancy, just a map with states and the ability to darken areas, states or plot dots on it for a location service I'm building. Google Maps can plot the markers, but I want this to be stupid …

snippet.title: A: Naming Convention for State / Region / Province
snippet.description: Google uses the term administrative_area_level_1 in their geocoder. administrative_area_level_1 indicates a first-order civil entity below the country level. Within the United States … , these administrative levels are states. Not all nations exhibit these administrative levels. administrative_area_level_2 indicates a second-order civil entity below the country level. Within the United States …
